scripts.optimize:react: uglifyjs dist/index.react.dev.js -c conditionals=false,sequences=false,loops=false,join_vars=false,collapse_vars=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty --mangle-props --mangle-regex="/^(_|normalizedNodeName|nextBase|prev[CPS]|_parentC)/" --name-cache config/properties.json -b width=120,quote_style=3 -o dist/index.react.js -p relative --in-source-map dist/index.react.dev.js.map --source-map dist/index.react.js.map
scripts.optimize:preact: uglifyjs dist/index.preact.dev.js -c conditionals=false,sequences=false,loops=false,join_vars=false,collapse_vars=false --pure-funcs=Object.defineProperty --mangle-props --mangle-regex="/^(_|normalizedNodeName|nextBase|prev[CPS]|_parentC)/" --name-cache config/properties.json -b width=120,quote_style=3 -o dist/index.preact.js -p relative --in-source-map dist/index.preact.dev.js.map --source-map dist/index.preact.js.map
scripts.minify:react: uglifyjs dist/index.react.js -c collapse_vars,evaluate,screw_ie8,unsafe,loops=false,keep_fargs=false,pure_getters,unused,dead_code -m -o dist/index.react.min.js -p relative --in-source-map dist/index.react.js.map --source-map dist/index.react.min.js.map
scripts.minify:preact: uglifyjs dist/index.preact.js -c collapse_vars,evaluate,screw_ie8,unsafe,loops=false,keep_fargs=false,pure_getters,unused,dead_code -m -o dist/index.preact.min.js -p relative --in-source-map dist/index.preact.js.map --source-map dist/index.preact.min.js.map
scripts.dist: npm-run-all --silent transpile:react transpile:preact optimize:react optimize:preact minify:react minify:preact size:react size:preact
